item.title: Live code on Shoes
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Updated my Shoes Tutorial Note. Added a new gallery No.3. :-D

# gallery3.png

Run it and rewrite the code whatever you want.
Then change colors at once, when you rewrite correct code. ;-)

Cheers,
ashbb

ps. The original code of this program was created by George and his grandson team. Thanks so much. :-D
